text: development is exposed to and may exacerbate; z consider the cumulative impact of existing and future development; and z demonstrate where adjacent to flood defences that development will safeguard and maintain the existing flood defences over its lifetime. 13.76 Developments within site allocations which seek to deliver their allocated use do not have to undertake a sequential test, even if the site is in flood zone 2 or 3, as required under Part 3(a).
